message: Hi Bob! Given that I face a 20% inflation each round, I propose a 60-40 split in my favor. This feels fair because my money will be worth less if we delay, while you might not face the same inflation penalty. Let's settle this quickly so we both benefit!

Hi Alice, I understand your concern about inflation. However, I think a 50-50 split is fair for both of us. This way, neither of us is at a disadvantage. Let's settle for this amount and avoid any further devaluation of our shares.
